description: This file defines the DockerResources class, which manages Docker-related resources including creation, deletion, and updating of Docker containers and apps within a project. It interacts with external Docker API clients, app definitions, and resource types, and includes methods for orchestrating Docker resource lifecycle operations with dependency management.

classes.name: DockerResources
classes.description: A class that manages a collection of Docker resources, providing methods to create, delete, and update Docker containers and apps with dependency resolution and lifecycle management.

methods.name: docker_client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns a DockerApiClient instance, caching it for reuse.

methods.name: create_resources
methods.description: Creates Docker resources and apps based on filters, dependencies, and user confirmation, with support for dry runs and force options.

methods.name: delete_resources
methods.description: Deletes Docker resources and apps based on filters, dependencies, and user confirmation, with support for dry runs and force options.

methods.name: update_resources
methods.description: Updates existing Docker resources and apps based on filters, dependencies, and user confirmation, with support for dry runs and force options.

methods.name: save_resources
methods.description: Not implemented; intended to save current resource states.
